name: Studio 64 Recovery
description: An intensive outpatient program offering a flexible schedule for individual therapy and peer support for addiction and mental health.

name: 2 California Center
description: Paradigm Teen Treatment is a teen and young adult rehab (ages 12-26) committed to treating mental health conditions.

name: Oro House Recovery
description: Oro House provides compassionate treatment and a continuum of services. Voted California's Best Addiction Treatment Center in 2020, 2021, and 2022 by Newsweek.

name: Banyan Stuart
description: Located near the coast, Banyan Stuart is a medical detox center offering a variety of therapies while in recovery.

name: Tikvah Lake Recovery
description: Tikvah Lake Recovery is an extremely personalized executive treatment center for those who seek the ultimate in treatment, privacy, and luxurious comfort.

name: Yatra Centre
description: A trauma care facility offering evidence-based, individualized care to clients with a range of mental health concerns.

name: Holina Rehab
description: A recovery gem taking a holistic approach to treating addiction and mental health, blending Eastern and Western techniques in luxurious, sea-view bungalows.

name: NEOVIVA
description: An ultra private, boutique rehab situated on the world-famous Lake Lucerne in Switzerland catering to executives and high-profile clients.

name: PROMIS Hay Farm
description: Tucked away on 12 acres of farmland, PROMIS Hay Farm is a countryside home offering therapy, educational programmes, and luxury amenities.
